text: (He paigambara) manisaharule madira ra juvaka kanunako sambandhama sodhchan. Bhanidinus yi thula papakarmaharu hun ra manisaharuka lagi yinabata kehi sansarika pha'ida pani chan, tara tinaka haniharu(papa) pha'idabhanda dherai thula chan. Yo pani tapa'isita sodhchan ki allahako margama kuna sampati kharca garun? Tapa'i bhanidinus ki (juna mala) avasyakata bhanda badhi cha. Yasaprakara, allaha aphna adesaharu spastarupama timro lagi varnana gardacha taki timiharu samjhane bujhne gara
